thread.title: '100 Years of Halloween Costumes' proves how stupid and not scary 'sexy' costumes are
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: '100 Years of Halloween Costumes' proves how stupid and not scary 'sexy' costumes are - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: '100 Years of Halloween Costumes' proves how stupid and not scary 'sexy' costumes are
text:
Halloween really is better when it's spookier and not sexy. And if you're not going to be scary, at least be funny.
That up there is the utterly terrifying 1935 version of a Minnie Mouse costume, and previous decades really brought the homemade horror to the world which just makes the more recent decades even more disappointing viewing.
The 80s really did ruin everything.
Via Mode
